articles.description: Reaction to Sunday's Premier League games, including a dramatic draw at Manchester City and a seven-goal thriller at Liverpool.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Spurs deny Man City, Liverpool fight back against Fulham

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he "will not do a Mikel Arteta comment" when asked about a controversial stoppage late in Manchester City's dramatic 3-3 draw with Tottenham.
articles.title: 'I won't do an Arteta comment' - Guardiola

articles.description: Sheffield United, beaten 5-0 defeat at Burnley on Saturday, are bottom of the Premier League with five points from 14 games.
articles.title: Sheff Utd set to sack manager Heckingbottom

articles.description: England and Bristol prop Kyle Sinckler says more players may follow captain Owen Farrell's lead and take a break from international rugby.
articles.title: Players may follow Farrell by taking break - Sinckler

articles.description: The event is in doubt after the state of Victoria withdrew from hosting duties over spiralling costs.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Gold Coast mayor scraps bid for 2026 event

articles.description: Barcelona beat Atletico Madrid with Joao Felix scoring the only goal of the game against his parent club.
articles.title: Joao Felix helps Barcelona beat parent club Atletico

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp says he doesn't think he has seen "a game with this amount of beautiful goals" after his Liverpool side beat Fulham in thriller.
articles.title: 'I've never seen a game with this many beautiful goals'

articles.description: West Indies captain Shai Hope hits an unbeaten 109 to guide his side to a four-wicket win over England.
articles.title: England lose thriller in opening ODI in West Indies

articles.description: The San Francisco 49ers get revenge on the Philadelphia Eagles with a dominant win while the Kansas City Chiefs lose at the Green Bay Packers.
articles.title: Dominant 49ers power to statement win over Eagles

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who has an appetite for goals? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week
